de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.statement: START ontologies = node:Ontologies("Identifier:*") MATCH (ontologies)<-[rel:INVOLVED_IN_BIOPROCESS]-(proteins)-[:BELONGS_TO_TAXONOMY]->(taxa)-[:IS_ANCESTOR_OF*..6]->(parent) WHERE (parent.Rank = 'Phylum') RETURN ontologies, parent, proteins
de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.title: Get Proteins by Biological Process and Phylum

de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.statement: START ontologies = node:Ontologies("Identifier:*") MATCH (ontologies)<-[rel:INVOLVED_IN_BIOPROCESS]-(proteins)-[:BELONGS_TO_TAXONOMY]->(taxa)-[:IS_ANCESTOR_OF*..3]->(parent) WHERE (parent.Rank = 'Family') RETURN ontologies, parent, proteins
de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.title: Get Proteins by Biological Process and Family

de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.statement: START ontologies = node:Ontologies("Identifier:*") MATCH (ontologies)<-[rel:BELONGS_TO_CELL_COMP]-(proteins)-[:BELONGS_TO_TAXONOMY]->(taxa)-[:IS_ANCESTOR_OF*..6]->(parent) WHERE (parent.Rank = 'Phylum') RETURN ontologies, parent, proteins
de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.title: Get Proteins by Cellular Component and Phylum

de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.statement: START ontologies = node:Ontologies("Identifier:*") MATCH (ontologies)<-[rel:BELONGS_TO_CELL_COMP]-(proteins)-[:BELONGS_TO_TAXONOMY]->(taxa)-[:IS_ANCESTOR_OF*..2]->(parent) WHERE (parent.Rank = 'Genus') RETURN ontologies, parent, proteins
de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.title: Get Proteins by Cellular Component and Genus

de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.statement: START ontologies = node:Ontologies("Identifier:*") MATCH (ontologies)<-[rel:HAS_MOLECULAR_FUNCTION]-(proteins)-[:BELONGS_TO_TAXONOMY]->(taxa)-[:IS_ANCESTOR_OF*..6]->(parent) WHERE (parent.Rank = 'Phylum') RETURN ontologies, parent, proteins
de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.title: Get Proteins by Molecular Function and Phylum

de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.statement: START ontologies = node:Ontologies("Identifier:*") MATCH (ontologies)<-[rel:HAS_MOLECULAR_FUNCTION]-(proteins)-[:BELONGS_TO_TAXONOMY]->(taxa)-[:IS_ANCESTOR_OF*..4]->(parent) WHERE (parent.Rank = 'Order') RETURN ontologies, parent, proteins
de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.title: Get Proteins by Molecular Function and Order

de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.statement: START taxa = node:Taxa("Identifier:*") MATCH (parent)<-[:IS_ANCESTOR_OF*..8]-(taxa)<-[rel:BELONGS_TO_TAXONOMY]-(proteins) WHERE (parent.Rank = 'Superkingdom') RETURN parent, taxa, proteins
de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.title: Get Proteins by Superkingdom and Species

de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.statement: START taxa = node:Taxa("Identifier:*") MATCH (parent)<-[:IS_ANCESTOR_OF*..7]-(taxa)<-[rel:BELONGS_TO_TAXONOMY]-(proteins) WHERE (parent.Rank = 'Kingdom') RETURN parent, taxa, proteins
de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.title: Get Proteins by Kingdom and Species

de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.statement: START taxa = node:Taxa("Identifier:*") MATCH (parent)<-[:IS_ANCESTOR_OF*..6]-(taxa)<-[rel:BELONGS_TO_TAXONOMY]-(proteins) WHERE (parent.Rank = 'Phylum') RETURN parent, taxa, proteins
de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.title: Get Proteins by Phylum and Species

de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.statement: START taxa = node:Taxa("Identifier:*") MATCH (parent)<-[:IS_ANCESTOR_OF*..5]-(taxa)<-[rel:BELONGS_TO_TAXONOMY]-(proteins) WHERE (parent.Rank = 'Class') RETURN parent, taxa, proteins
de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.title: Get Proteins by Class and Species

de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.statement: START taxa = node:Taxa("Identifier:*") MATCH (parent)<-[:IS_ANCESTOR_OF*..4]-(taxa)<-[rel:BELONGS_TO_TAXONOMY]-(proteins) WHERE (parent.Rank = 'Order') RETURN parent, taxa, proteins
de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.title: Get Proteins by Order and Species

de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.statement: START taxa = node:Taxa("Identifier:*") MATCH (parent)<-[:IS_ANCESTOR_OF*..3]-(taxa)<-[rel:BELONGS_TO_TAXONOMY]-(proteins) WHERE (parent.Rank = 'Family') RETURN parent, taxa, proteins
de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.title: Get Proteins by Family and Species

de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.statement: START taxa = node:Taxa("Identifier:*") MATCH (parent)<-[:IS_ANCESTOR_OF*..2]-(taxa)<-[rel:BELONGS_TO_TAXONOMY]-(proteins) WHERE (parent.Rank = 'Genus') RETURN parent, taxa, proteins
de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.title: Get Proteins by Genus and Species

de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.statement: START proteins = node:Proteins("Identifier:*") MATCH (proteins)-[:HAS_PEPTIDE]->(peptides)<-[:IS_MATCH_IN]-(spectra) RETURN spectra, peptides, proteins
de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.title: Get Spectra by Peptides and Proteins

de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.statement: START proteins = node:Proteins("Identifier:*") MATCH (metaprot)-[:IS_METAPROTEIN_OF]->(proteins)-[:HAS_PEPTIDE]->(peptides)<-[:IS_MATCH_IN]-(spectra) RETURN spectra, peptides, metaprot, proteins
de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.title: Get Spectra by Peptides and MetaProteins

de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.statement: START peptides = node:Peptides("Identifier:*") MATCH (metaprot)-[:IS_METAPROTEIN_OF]->(proteins)-[:HAS_PEPTIDE]->(peptides)<-[:IS_MATCH_IN]-(spectra) RETURN peptides, metaprot, proteins, spectra
de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.title: Get Peptides by MetaProteins and Spectra

de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.statement: START peptides = node:Peptides("Identifier:*") MATCH (proteins)-[:HAS_PEPTIDE]->(peptides)<-[:IS_MATCH_IN]-(spectra) RETURN peptides, proteins, spectra
de.mpa.graphdb.cypher.CypherQuery.title: Get Peptides by Proteins and Spectra
